actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the limitation on the credit for certain State-imposed gaming taxes under section 4464.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the limitation on the excise tax credit for State gaming taxes on coin-operated devices from 80 to 95 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the limitation on the credit for certain State-imposed gaming taxes under section 4464.
